rocketbuilder module¶

class rocketbuilder.RocketBuilder[source]¶

Bases: object

Gets component information and facilitates the construction of a new and unique rockets.Rocket to use in the simulation

componentTabs¶

Categories of rockets.Component

alias of State

classmethod componentButtonClicked(component)[source]¶

A helper method that changes the selected component. This is used in the buttons in the component list

Parameters:component (rockets.Component) – The component class to set as active
classmethod drawComponentInfo()[source]¶

Uses the active component to draw component information to the right info pane on the screen.

classmethod drawComponentList(selectedTab)[source]¶

Draws the list of available components to the screen using the provided category.

Parameters:selectedTab (componentTabs) – The currently selected category of components to draw
classmethod drawComponentMenu()[source]¶

Draws the component menu to the componentSurface class member, including the componentTabs and the componentList.

classmethod drawComponentTabs()[source]¶

Draws the categorical tabs at the top of the componentSurface.

classmethod drawHeldSprite()[source]¶

Draws the sprite of the active component to the screen at the position of the mouse

classmethod drawMenu()[source]¶

Method encapsulates drawing of the entire rocket builder display, making this the top-level drawing method.

classmethod drawRocket()[source]¶

Draws the rocket-in-construction to the center of the display surface.

classmethod intersectsWithRocket(component)[source]¶

Tests whether or not a component, if placed at the current mouse position, will intersect with the rocket

Parameters:component (rockets.Component) – The component class to test
classmethod mousePosToPymunkTransform(component, reflected=False)[source]¶

Takes in a component class or instance, and the mouse position. Assuming that the component is being held by mouse in its center, this finds the transform needed to translate between the component’s inherent verteces and the mouse’s current position in pymunk space.

Parameters:
  • component (rockets.Component) – The component who’s position to transform
  • reflected (bool) – Will reflect the transform about the x axis if set to True
classmethod placeComponenet(component)[source]¶

Tests if it is possible to place the given component, and will place it if possible. Returns True if the component was placed, and False if it was not.

Parameters:component (rockets.Component) – The component to attempt to place
classmethod removeComponent(component)[source]¶

Removes a component from the rocket.

Parameters:component (rockets.Component) – The component to attempt to remove
classmethod run()[source]¶

Contains and executes the main event loop of the rocket builder.

classmethod setCurrentTab(state)[source]¶

A helper method that changes the selected tab. This is used in the tab buttons to change the component list.

classmethod toggleSymmetry()[source]¶

A helper method that toggles the symmetry flag.

classmethod updateSubSurfaces()[source]¶

A helper method the correctly set the size and position of the componentSurface and componentInfoSurface when the game window is resized.

_baseComponent = <rockets.commandmodule.CommandModule object>¶

This component will be the base, and can’t be removed from the rocket in construction

_bgColor = (0, 0, 0)¶

The background color of the builder

_bottomOfTabs = 0¶

Represents the y position seperating the component category tabs from the actual buttons in the menu

_menuButtonColor = ((100, 100, 100), (64, 64, 64))¶

The unfocused and focused colors of the menu buttons, respectively.

_menuPaneColor = (128, 128, 128)¶

The color of the menu panes

_symmetry = False¶

Represents whether components will be placed with symmetry about the center of the rocket

_zoom = <graphics.zoom.Zoom object>¶
activeComponent = None¶

Used to represent the component that is being held by the user’s mouse

componentInfoSurface = None¶

The Sub-Surface representing the component information display

componentList = []¶

List of currently displayed rockets.Component types

componentSurface = None¶

The Sub-Surface representing the pygame.surface.Surface selection screen

selectedTab = 1¶

The active category of components from componentTabs Initialized to the Thruster category

space = <pymunk.space.Space object>¶

The pymunk.Space used to construct the rocket

start_event = 25¶

A custom event for triggering the exit of the building step and the beginning of the simulation

surface = None¶

The pygame.surface.Surface that the builder will be drawn to

theRocket = Body(0.0, 0.0, Body.DYNAMIC)¶

The rocket being constructed
